channel.title: CVE Feed for Joomla! Project -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Joomla! Project -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-27185|2024-08-20T16:03:58.015Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The pagination class includes arbitrary parameters in links, leading to cache poisoning attack vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-27186|2024-08-20T16:03:56.863Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The mail template feature lacks an escaping mechanism, causing XSS vectors in multiple extensions.

item.title: CVE-2024-27184|2024-08-20T16:03:51.605Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Inadequate validation of URLs could result into an invalid check whether an redirect URL is internal or not..

item.title: CVE-2024-40743|2024-08-20T16:14:02.672Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The stripImages and stripIframes methods didn't properly process inputs, leading to XSS vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-27187|2024-08-20T16:03:43.540Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Improper Access Controls allows backend users to overwrite their username when disallowed.

item.title: CVE-2024-21729|2024-08-02T04:34:57.555Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Inadequate input validation leads to XSS vulnerabilities in the accessiblemedia field.

item.title: CVE-2024-26279|2024-08-02T04:34:07.431Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The wrapper extensions do not correctly validate inputs, leading to XSS vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-26278|2024-08-02T04:33:52.095Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The Custom Fields component not correctly filter inputs, leading to a XSS vector.

item.title: CVE-2024-21730|2024-08-02T04:33:43.196Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The fancyselect list field layout does not correctly escape inputs, leading to a self-XSS vector.

item.title: CVE-2024-21731|2024-08-02T04:33:41.988Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Improper handling of input could lead to an XSS vector in the StringHelper::truncate method.

item.title: CVE-2024-21729|2024-08-01T22:27:35.802Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
